## steelseries-rose-gauge package

A simple add-on for [steelseries](https://github.com/nicolas-van/steelseries) library.

Provides a rose chart round gauge.

## Classes

|  Class | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [Rose](./steelseries-rose-gauge.rose.md) | Round Rose-Chart Gauge |

## Interfaces

|  Interface | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [RoseParams](./steelseries-rose-gauge.roseparams.md) | Rose gauge construction parameters |
